Modules | Files | Macros
EDMA
IP

Modules

 EDMA trtansfer type definitions.
 Values that can be used to specify different synchronization events.
 
 EDMA addressing modes definitions.
 Values that can be used to specify different addressing modes (relevant for SAM and DAM sub-fields in OPT field).
 
 EDMA FIFO width definitions.
 Values that can be used to specify different FIFO widths (FWID in OPT field).
 

Files

file  edma.h
 This file contains the function prototypes for the device abstraction layer for EDMA.

#define EDMA3_0_TC0_ERRINT   ((uint32_t) 13U)
 

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define EDMA3_0_CC0_ERRINT   ((uint32_t) 12U)

Interrupt no. for CC Error

#define EDMA3_0_CC_XFER_COMPLETION_INT   ((uint32_t) 11U)

Interrupt no. for Transfer Completion

#define EDMA3_0_NUM_EVTQUE   ((uint32_t) 4U)

Number of Event Queues available

#define EDMA3_0_NUM_TC   ((uint32_t) 4U)

Number of Transfer Controllers available

#define EDMA3_0_TC0_ERRINT   ((uint32_t) 13U)

Interrupt no. for TCs Error

#define EDMA3_NUM_PARAMSET   ((uint32_t) 512U)

Number of PaRAM Sets available
